Method Detail

getBlurb

public static java.lang.String getBlurb(java.lang.String inittopic)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
This method creates the blurb for the location by frist parsing the name, then utlizing the third party package JSoup to parse through and pick out the first paragraph of the location's wikipedia page. It then is prepared to be outputed in the text area

Parameters:
inittopic - the location, in name,city,state form
Returns:
The fully formated string blurb ready to be displayed
Throws:
java.io.IOException
